title: Cardano Founder Dr. Charles Hoskinson on the Symptoms of Charles Derangement Syndrome (CDS)
description: Earlier today, in a post on social media platform X, formerly known as Twitter, Charles Hoskinson, the co-founder of Ethereum and founder of Cardano, shed light on a phenomenon he calls “Charles Derangement Syndrome” (CDS). Hoskinson’s 10-point list dissects the characteristics and behaviors of individuals who may be affected by this condition. “Charles Derangement Syndrome” […]

title: BlockFi To Receive $874M After Settling With FTX, Alameda Estates
description: Bankrupt crypto lender BlockFi has reached an “in principle” agreement with the estates of FTX and Alameda Research, which could see the firm receive nearly $874 billion pending judicial approval.

title: African Economies at Risk of Falling Behind in the AI Revolution
description: African economies face a critical challenge in adapting to the transformative impact of artificial intelligence (AI) on business operations. Despite the global shift towards AI integration, the continent’s limited capacity for virtual storage and outdated mobile technology pose significant obstacles. Connectivity and data storage deficiencies Businesses incorporating AI into their processes require high-speed connectivity and […]

title: Shiba Inu community anticipates ICANN approval for SHIB names
description: The Shiba Inu development team, in collaboration with D3 Global, has announced the launch of “SHIB Names,” a domain name service designed for the Shiba Inu community. This launch marks a pivotal moment for the SHIB ecosystem, offering users a unique opportunity to secure their own Shiba Inu-themed domain names. To celebrate the occasion, an […]

title: Trader loses over $674K to phishing scam
description: An unidentified market participant unfortunately fell victim to a phishing scam, leading to a significant loss of over $674,000 in USDC amid the escalating prevalence of these deceptive schemes. Blockchain security platform PeckShield identified the incident in a recent post…

title: BTC whale activity declines amid extremely greedy market conditions
description: The daily Bitcoin (BTC) whale activity has declined while the market weathers extremely greedy sentiment. According to data provided by Santiment, the number of whale transactions consisting of at least $100,000 worth of BTC declined by 17.5% in the past…

title: Andreessen Horowitz (a16z) pauses  crypto fund expansion for AI endeavor
description: Andreessen Horowitz (a16z), a Silicon Valley-based venture capital firm, is recalibrating its investment strategy. The company is aiming to raise $6.9 billion for new funds with a focus on artificial intelligence (AI). This shift puts the brakes on its crypto…

title: Las Vegas CEO faces 127 years for crypto laundering linked to cartels and charity fraud
description: The CEO of a Las Vegas Internet company could face a 127-year prison sentence following his conviction for laundering over $4 million with Bitcoin, funds connected to Mexican cartels, and a hacked charity, according to the Department of Justice. Martin…
